answerText: tides[10] The Coriolis effect acts on tidal systems to cause rotating systems of waves. At the center of those systems are these points where tidal variation is exactly zero.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 6 | 2 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These phenomena, which occur in neap and spring varieties, have unusually strong variation in the Bay of Fundy. For 10 points each, name: [10] These oceanic phenomena which are caused by the gravitational pull of the sun and moon on Earth's waters.
